sentences.en: And these must be addressed if they are not to taint the wider market.
sentences.cn: 这些必须解决,否则可能扩散到更广泛的市场.

sentences.en: Bad books will taint the young mind.
sentences.cn: 坏书会毒害年青人的思想.

sentences.en: Baker argues that his trial was tainted by negative publicity.
sentences.cn: 贝克抗辩说他的审判受到了负面宣传的影响。

sentences.en: Everything possible should be done to free them from the economic taint.
sentences.cn: 应尽可能把他们从经济的腐蚀中解脱出来.

sentences.en: Hitherto Barchester had escaped the taint of any extreme rigour of church doctrine.
sentences.cn: 顶到这时候为止,巴彻斯特一直逃脱了任何极端严厉的教条的污染.

sentences.en: Moral taint has spread among young people.
sentences.cn: 道德的败坏在年轻人之间蔓延.

sentences.en: No taint of dishonor ever touched him.
sentences.cn: 他从未蒙受不名誉的污点.

sentences.en: Rancid oil will taint the flavour.
She could smell the taint of sin in the most innocent of passions.
sentences.cn: 哪怕是再纯真的恋情她也能从中嗅出罪恶的味道。

sentences.en: Such is the taint in us.
The taint within it resonates with the corruption in my bones.
sentences.cn: 它其中的污秽之力与我骨髓里的堕落共鸣着.

sentences.en: The warm weather will taint the food.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气会使食品腐烂.

sentences.en: Then, slowly, he began to take a terrible joy in his taint.
sentences.cn: 后来, 慢慢地, 他开始对自己身上的污点怀着一种可怕的喜悦.

sentences.en: There are two common wine faults with Wine, cork taint and oxidation.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒有两个常见的故障, 瓶塞污染或发生氧化.

sentences.en: There seems to be a taint of drunkenness in his family.
sentences.cn: 他的家族中似乎有酗酒的遗风.

sentences.en: What we smell with cork taint is mould , smelly socks cabbage or a wet hessian bag - phew!
sentences.cn: 我们闻到的是污染瓶塞的发霉味道, 卷心菜的味道,或湿麻袋的味道烦人!

sentences.en: When performing taint flow analysis, the scanner models the flow of data within the system.
sentences.cn: 当执行污染流分析时，检测器会在这个系统中为数据流建立模型。

trans.tran_cn: 污点，污名，<废〉气味，传染，腐败
trans.tran_en: the appearance of being related to something bad or morally wrong
to damage something by adding an unwanted substance to it

trans.tran_cn: 使变质，使污染，败坏，玷污
